statements: UPDATE budgeting_processes SET software_integration = TRUE WHERE process_id = 1;
UPDATE budgeting_processes SET process_name = 'Quarterly Budgeting' WHERE process_id = 2;
UPDATE budgeting_processes SET software_integration = TRUE, process_name = 'Updated Process' WHERE process_id = 1;
UPDATE budgeting_processes SET process_name = 'New Process', software_integration = FALSE WHERE process_id = 2;
UPDATE Budgets SET total_amount = 5000.00 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE Expenses SET amount = 250.75, category = 'Supplies' WHERE id = 3;
UPDATE Budgets SET total_amount = total_amount - 500 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE Expenses SET amount = amount + 100, category = 'Miscellaneous' WHERE id = 3;
UPDATE budget_transactions SET amount = 500.00 WHERE transaction_id = 1234;
UPDATE budget_categories SET category_name = 'Groceries' WHERE category_id = 1;
UPDATE budget_transactions SET amount = 1000.00 WHERE transaction_id = 1;
UPDATE budget_users SET email = 'newemail@example.com', username = 'new_username' WHERE user_id = 5;
UPDATE Budgets SET budget_name='Marketing Budget', start_date='2022-01-01', end_date='2022-12-31' WHERE budget_id=1;
UPDATE Budgets SET start_date='2022-06-01', budget_name='Sales Budget', end_date='2022-12-31' WHERE budget_id=2;
UPDATE Budgets SET budget_name = 'Quarterly Expenses Budget', start_date = '2022-07-01', end_date = '2022-09-30' WHERE budget_id = 1;
UPDATE Budgets SET start_date = '2022-10-01', end_date = '2022-12-31', budget_name = 'Yearly Budget' WHERE budget_id = 2;
UPDATE budget_categories SET category_description = 'Updated description' WHERE category_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE budget_transactions SET amount = 1500.50, description = 'Updated transaction details' WHERE transaction_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
UPDATE budget_transactions SET description = 'Updated Description', amount = 1500.00 WHERE transaction_id = 'c01c495a-1d8d-4b47-a973-62e23122d123';
UPDATE budget_categories SET category_description = 'New Category Description', category_name = 'Updated Category Name' WHERE category_id = '29d179d8-e301-4e7f-97e8-56e52610b321';
